Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.container

Collection classes for this library

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContainerFactory
    Allows for mocking of Class.newInstance() for containers.
    SequentialAccess
    Opposite of RandomAccess.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayAsFixedSizeList<TValue>
    This class combines features of FixedSizeForwardingList with Arrays.asList(Object[]).
    ArrayAsImmutableList<TValue>
    This class has the same effect as: Collections.unmodifiableList(Arrays.asList(arr.clone())).
    ArrayAsUnmodifiableList<TValue>
    This class has the same effect as: Collections.unmodifiableList(Arrays.asList(arr)).
    BaseFixedSizeForwardingList<TValue>
    This is a base class used by FixedSizeForwardingList and UnmodifiableForwardingList.
    ByteArraySimpleBuilder
    Very simple class to build a byte array: byte[].
    ContainerFactoryImpl  
    FixedSizeForwardingList<TValue>
    This is a specialized form of ForwardingList that does not allow the underlying list size to change.
    FixedSizeListIterator<TValue>
    This class is a simple extension of ForwardingListIterator, where methods FixedSizeListIterator.add(Object) and FixedSizeListIterator.remove() are disabled -- always throw UnsupportedOperationException.
    UnmodifiableForwardingIterator<TValue>
    This class is a simple extension of ForwardingIterator, where method UnmodifiableForwardingIterator.remove() is disabled -- always throws UnsupportedOperationException.
    UnmodifiableForwardingList<TValue>
    This is a specialized form of ForwardingList that does not allow the underlying list to change.
    UnmodifiableForwardingListIterator<TValue>
    This class is a simple extension of ForwardingListIterator, where methods UnmodifiableForwardingListIterator.add(Object), UnmodifiableForwardingListIterator.remove(), and UnmodifiableForwardingListIterator.set(Object) are disabled -- always throw UnsupportedOperationException.

Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.container Description

Collection classes for this library

This package is a part of the open-source Papaya library.
